basics.name: Robert Douglas
basics.label: Senior Frontend Developer & Design Engineer
basics.summary: Developer / designer with 20+ years experience in web and mobile, I currently work as a Senior Front-end Developer at Welcome to the Jungle. Previously, I spent four years leading the Design & UX team at Rightmove (UK’s largest property website) followed by six years as a 'multidisciplinaire' at ribot (mobile design studio). After moving to France I led a cross-functional team at a VR startup remotely before joining Welcome to the Jungle six years ago.

work.name: Welcome to the Jungle
work.summary: Lead frontend development for the B2C job search platform. Focus on new features, performance optimization, and component library development.
highlights: Implemented new features and evolutions of B2C site with React / Vite / react-testing-library and Cypress
Led performance improvements: TTFB -70%, LCP -50%, CLS 0.02s
Implemented Cloudfront CDN strategy reducing latency globally
Established site performance (CRUX) and tracking best practices
Built internal tools and maintained component library
Increased code coverage and mentored junior developers

work.name: Pupil
work.summary: Led frontend development team managing tech stack and code consistency.
highlights: Managed frontend developers and maintained tech stack decisions
Delivered and iterated on React/Redux application
Ensured code consistency and quality across team

work.name: ribot
work.summary: Multidisciplinary role at award-winning mobile design studio. Contributed across research, design, development, and project management.
highlights: User research, design, development, and project management
Led design and frontend development for Tesco's first mobile apps (Nokia, iPhone, iPad, Windows Phone, Chrome)
Designed and developed Intel proof-of-concepts and prototypes
Developed mobile and web prototypes for diverse client base
Mentored team members in professional development

volunteer.summary: Mentored aspiring developers transitioning into tech careers.
highlights: Provided code reviews and pair programming sessions
Guided students through projects and best practices

projects.name: anucreative Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio and CV website built with React, TanStack Router, and deployed on Netlify.
highlights: Multi-theme support with CSS variables
JSON Resume schema integration
Performance optimized (100 Lighthouse score)
Open source monorepo structure
